meanings.definition: Collided violently with an obstacle or another vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The car crashed into the tree.
meanings.sent2: The two cars crashed at the intersection.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel crashed into the bird feeder, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The thunderous sound of the crashing waves filled the air.

meanings.definition: Suffered a sudden and severe failure.
meanings.sent1: The computer crashed right before the important presentation.
meanings.sent2: Her hopes crashed when she didn't get the job.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake crashed to the floor, much to everyone's dismay.
meanings.sent4: His dreams crashed like a falling star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The stock market crashed, causing chaos in the financial world.

meanings.sent1: The thunder crashed in the stormy sky.
meanings.sent2: The falling books crashed to the ground.
meanings.sent3: The pots and pans crashed together as she tried to cook dinner.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks crashed and boomed in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The crashing cymbals signaled the end of the musical performance.
